user.title: Parcel Configuration
user.description: Set up Parcel tracking for parcelapp

add_parcel.name: Add Parcel
add_parcel.description: Add a new parcel to ParcelApp for tracking

parcel_name.name: Parcel Name
parcel_name.description: The name of the parcel to track

tracking_number.name: Tracking Number
tracking_number.description: The tracking number of the parcel

courier.name: Courier
courier.description: The courier service handling the parcel. Refer to the list of supported carrier keys, for example, for ACS Courier the key is 'acs'. The list is available at https://api.parcel.app/external/supported_carriers.json.

tracking_number.name: Tracking Number
tracking_number.description: The tracking number of the parcel to delete

type.name: Courier
type.description: The courier service handling the parcel. Refer to the list of supported carrier keys, for example, for ACS Courier the key is 'acs'. The list is available at https://api.parcel.app/external/supported_carriers.json.

edit_parcel.name: Edit Parcel
edit_parcel.description: Edit an existing parcel in ParcelApp

parcel_name.name: Parcel Name
parcel_name.description: The updated name of the parcel

tracking_number.name: Tracking Number
tracking_number.description: The updated tracking number of the parcel

courier.name: Courier
courier.description: The updated courier service handling the parcel. Refer to the list of supported carrier keys, for example, for ACS Courier the key is 'acs'. The list is available at https://api.parcel.app/external/supported_carriers.json.

old_number.name: Old Tracking Number
old_number.description: The original tracking number of the parcel

old_type.name: Old Type
old_type.description: The original type of the parcel (e.g., package)
